basics.name: Ronaldo Saheki
basics.label: DevOps Engineer at OLX Group
basics.summary:
IT Professional with 10 years of experience and high expertise in automating operations tasks for deployment and configuration of workstations, IT infrastructure servers/services, High Performance Computing/Beowulf clusters, High Availability clusters and cloud application environments using a wide variety of open source technologies and tools, and using code and scripts written in bash and python. Previously responsible for IT operations, application delivery and business environment availability at PayWithMyBank and SocialBase, using cloud (AWS) and on-premises resources.  Familiarity with ITIL and Agile methodologies and responsible to create automation for new products developed in new offers at Chaordic, leader in ecommerce personalization in Latin America. Now in Global Vertical infrastructure role at OLX Group.

Background experience testing and implementing new solutions in the corporate IT infrastructure of Petrobras (Brazilian biggest company in the Forbes list). Skilled in installing new servers in many environments such as high availability and high performance Computer clusters, including the TRINDADE supercomputing cluster of Petrobras in Espirito Santo – Brazil which occupied the 100th position in the list of TOP500 most powerful (non-distributed) computer systems in the world, GRID computing implantation and support for high performance  applications, virtualization and remote visualization. 

Experienced in supporting and troubleshooting systems in complex corporate infrastructure, identifying and solving bottlenecks to onboard a client to the web platform and support a tenfold sudden growth and support production go live of omnichannel retail solutions for biggest e-commerces in Brazil, migration from datacenter to cloud and enthusiastic tester of new technologies.

Familiarity with ITIL and Agile methodologies
